main.title: Hi! I'm Izan SÃ¡nchez. />
main.description: I am 14 years old, and I am passionate about web development. I am always looking for new ways to improve and expand my knowledge, so I can apply it to new projects.

experience.title: <!-- EXPERIENCE -->
experience.description1: Although I don't have professional experience yet, I'm only 15 years old, I have collaborated with my athletics club by developing a more modern and useful website for them, which you can see in the projects section.
experience.description2: At the end of 2022, I started researching how websites are built, and I tried WordPress, but it didn't convince me too much.
experience.description3: In the summer of 2023, I participated in the Menorca Summer Camp at Leagues of Code, where I learned HTML and CSS.
experience.description4: Since then, I have continued learning on my own, thanks to the courses by @soydalto and @midudev.

skills.title: <!-- SKILLS -->
skills.description: So far, I have acquired the following knowledge thanks to the courses by @soydalto and @midudev. My goal is to keep learning to become a full-stack web developer.

projects.title: <!-- PROJECTS -->
projects.description1: One of my most outstanding projects has been the modernization of my athletics club's website. This project taught me to commit to a task and strive to give my best.
projects.description2: In addition, I have developed this portfolio itself, applying and consolidating my current web development knowledge to showcase my skills and experiences.

courses.title: <!-- COURSES -->
courses.description: The following materials are courses that have helped me gain the knowledge I have so far.
